overview: A truly engaging and exciting fairy tale. The Duchess Jessica is desperately looking for true love, for a man who is faithful to her, it doesn't matter that she is a King, she is only looking for a sincere person! To test the allegiance of all the men in the kingdom she sends her court maids to bestow their splendid graces! Result?... orgies like hell... Will our Duchess succeed in her intentions?
title: Leap of Faith
